user.title: Connect to your indevolt Device
user.description: Enter the connection details for your device.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect. Please check the IP address and port, and ensure the device is online.
error.unknown: An unknown error occurred. Please check the Home Assistant logs for more details.

abort.already_configured: This device has already been configured.

data_description.scan_interval: How often to poll the device for new data (5-300 seconds)
data_description.max_charge_power: Maximum allowed charging power in Watts (100-2000W). The device will reject commands exceeding this limit.
data_description.max_discharge_power: Maximum allowed discharging power in Watts (100-2000W). The device will reject commands exceeding this limit.
data_description.virtual_min_soc: Minimum SOC percentage (0-50%). Charge/discharge commands will be blocked when battery reaches this level to protect battery health.
data_description.is_main_device: Enable if this device is the main unit in a cluster configuration. Cluster commands will only be sent to the main device.
